blogPost.excerpt: Instantly create photo-real avatars of friends, family, celebrities, paintings, by using any photo with a face! In one click, make them sing, say anything you want, puppet their face like you an Animoji. Check out our new holiday backgrounds too!
blogPost.body: Instantly create photo-real avatars of friends, family, celebrities, paintings, by using any photo with a face! In one click, make them sing, say anything you want, puppet their face like you an Animoji. Check out our new holiday backgrounds too!
blogPost.title: Tokkingheads by Rosebud - Instantly animate a portrait photo w/ text, speech, or video
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 即时创建照片真实的化身的朋友，家人，名人，绘画，通过使用任何照片与一张脸！只需点击一下，就可以让他们唱歌，说任何你想说的话，把他们的脸伪装成你是一个阿尼莫吉。也来看看我们新的假期背景吧！
localize.tagline: 使用文本、语音或视频即时制作肖像照片动画

localize.description: 即時創建照片真實的化身的朋友，家人，名人，繪畫，通過使用任何照片與一張臉！只需點擊一下，就可以讓他們唱歌，說任何你想說的話，把他們的臉僞裝成你是一個阿尼莫吉。也來看看我們新的假期背景吧！
localize.tagline: 使用文本、語音或視頻即時製作肖像照片動畫

next.title:
January's big highlight on Amazon Prime Video is "One Night in Miami," a fictional account of a meeting in 1964 between four Black icons: Cassius Clay, Malcolm X, Sam Cooke and Jim Brown.
https://t.co/XBbyCzUDvp

localize.full_text:
一月份亚马逊Prime Video的最大亮点是“迈阿密一夜”(One Night In Miami)，这是一个虚构的故事，讲述了1964年四位黑人偶像卡修斯·克莱(Cassius Clay)、马尔科姆·X(Malcolm X)、萨姆·库克(Sam Cooke)和吉姆·布朗(
https://t.co/XBbyCzUDvp
